title: Eden huan mawi chantu Adama thlah
lyrics:
Eden huan mawi chantu Adama thlah,
Chungnung anchhe khuma ka vah laiin;
Ngai teh, Bethlehem chung angel aw chuan,
"Lawm r'u, Rem Lal a lo piang ta," a ti.
Chutin chhiarsen loh van mi aw mawi chuan,
"Lei chungah rem leng se,"tiin an zai.

An zawn laiin van Lal fa ni mah se,
Hruaitu arsi chuan ran in chhung a chhun;
A tlawm mang e, Van Lal tan ranthleng chu,
Vanten hmangaihna mak an tih a zual.
Nang leh kei vanga ranthleng a chan hi,
A tawk em ni? A tan a tawk em ni?

Khual in chang lo Lal Isua tun thlengin,
A hmangaihte zingah a hnawng fo thin;
"Kawng min hawn rawh,"tia dil thintu chu,
A hmangaihten engtin, tak chhang ang maw?
Hnawng tawh suh se khawvel Chhandamtu chu,
A vahvaih nan Judai kha tawk rawh se.

Aw, Isu lo kal la, ka thinlungah,
Chenga cham reng atan ka ngen ache;
An hlan ranthleng leh thing anchhedawng chu,
I lawm thin faknain lo thlak sela.
Chutin khawvel tan i tuarna na kha,
